response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors and contribute greatly to your success. This product holds immense value to me, but I understand its true worth lies in finding the right owner who can appreciate and utilize it to its full potential. After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. I am confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any additional information to make your decision.", "product_price": 950000}
